## Entity.setOpacity() method

Sets the opacity of the entity.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setOpacity(opacity: number): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

opacity


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The opacity of the entity between 0 and 1. 0 is fully transparent, 1 is fully opaque.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

void
